text: ao banda anak mean chomnue. yeang dauch me d ch ban chea puok anak now pel del mean ke banhchea puok anak tha chaur puok anak chenhtow( brayoutth) knong meakra robsa a l laoh puok anak bercha khchelochraausa kranh nung dei ( lomnow dthan) towvinh? tae puok anak penh chetd nung karorsanow knong lokey cheang barlok ryy? bo nde sophomongkol nei karorsanow knong lokey min ach brieb tow nung thngai barlok ban laey leukleng te bantich b nuo d ch bonnaoh
